definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]
to remain fresh in one's memory (idiom)
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
Sandy Lam (1966-), Hong Kong pop singer
to view one's past as miserable and one's present as happy (idiom)
to talk (or write) about one's recollections of past events
unsavory meal taken in remembrance of past hardships/fig. poor-tasting meal
USB flash drive/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]

sentences.english: The flowers give straight must admire, Mo to be whispering a beginning.
sentences.chinese: 有花堪赏直须赏，莫待花落忆初开。

sentences.english: Recallable track effect and instrument configurations.
sentences.chinese: 忆轨道效应和仪器的配置。

sentences.english: Estimates suggest the cost to the poultry industry has been in excess of US$10 billion.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，家禽饲养业的损失已超过100忆美元。

sentences.english: Some time ago I was recalling all these years you thought you the most pain at the top.
sentences.chinese: 前些日子是我这些年来忆你最痛思你最深的颠峰。

sentences.english: Don't go out of the spring fragrance, recalling the stream.
sentences.chinese: 勿彷徨，脱素裹着春装，忆流芳。

sentences.english: When I played with sister and with brother.
sentences.chinese: 忆儿时与兄弟姐妹嘻游。

sentences.english: Now we see it in a whole bunch of other populations.
sentences.chinese: 现在忆覆盖了所有的其他人群。

sentences.english: Memories of two people hand-in-hand experience .
sentences.chinese: 两个仌旳囙忆手牵手旳经历。

sentences.english: Have all day for a cup of strong wine, drunk into the flow of acacia every year.
sentences.chinese: 忆所有的日子为一杯浓酒，年年醉倒成流动的相思。

sentences.english: Aye, you shall be together even in the silent memory or God.
sentences.chinese: 噫，连在静默的忆想上帝之时，你们也要合一。

definition: to recall with emotion/to feel sentiments
late at night/in the dead of night
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
